GSD.description:
ARM: 9214/1: alignment: advance IT state after emulating Thumb instruction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.132 by commit db6e8c30154f390348b5bd6e8028461b90c0876e. For more details please see the references link.
